channel.title: Ico, Shadow of the Colossus Confirmed For PS3 Re-release
channel.description:
[url]https://kotaku.com/5638207/ico-shadow-of-the-colossus-confirmed-for-playstation-3-re+release[/url]
Perhaps this will be my chance to finally play these games.
Here's hoping for a 1080p re-release running at 60fps.

item.title: Ico, Shadow of the Colossus Confirmed For PS3 Re-release
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
Maxey:

Here’s hoping for a 1080p re-release running at 60fps.

They’ll probably be like God of War collection. 720p at 60 FPS. Dunno why they didn’t do 1080p, but whatever.

Shadow of the Colossus was pretty cool, and I never did beat ICO, so I might pick this up. I only beat Shadow of the Colossus once, and wouldn’t mind playing it again. Trophies would make me more eager to explore and find everything

Read full topic
